This is a moving hitbox. It moves at 2.8m in Y direction per attack and starts at Y: 1m (pay attention to the offsetY!).
This is part of a moving hitbox. This hitbox spawns at Y: 1 + 14*1.7 = 24.8m (pay attention to the offsetY!).
Q/C4/C6 has a detection area of 7m around the position of this hitbox.
Spawns at the Q-Initial position.
Q spawns at offsetY 5 and has a detection area of 10m. This attack is only triggered if the Player is within the Q detection area.

skill.notes: Spawns on target that Pressurized Collapse proc'd on.

burst.notes: Q detection area for Prayerful Wind's Benefit (Anemo%) is 40m, for Perfidious Wind's Bale (Anemo res shred) it is 6m around the current Q position. Q moves around in a triangle with its center being the same as Q-Initial between 3 positions: top right (offsetX: 5.19, offsetY: 10.5), top left (offsetX: -5.19, offsetY: 10.5), bottom middle (offsetY: 1.5). Starting from top right it moves counterclockwise.

burst.notes: Q/A4/C4 has a detection area of 10m around the position of this hitbox. This hitbox is a 0 damage attack that is not implemented yet.

At every tick: If there are enemies within the Q detection area that are not currently marked, then it spawns at a random enemy out of those. This random enemy is then marked for 1.45s. Otherwise, it will spawn randomly between 0.5m and 9.5m from the Q center.

charge.notes: There are up to 5 possible instances of CA-1, CA-2, CA-3. It looks for an anchor enemy in 5m radius around player. If such an enemy exists, then it looks for additional enemies in 4m radius around the anchor enemy. If less than 5 enemies were targeted, then it checks for gadgets to target.

skill.notes: Spawns at the position Player was at when E was used.

burst.notes: Q has a detection area of 10m around the position of Player when Q was used. At every tick: If there are enemies within the Q detection area that are not currently marked, then it spawns at a random enemy out of those. This random enemy is then marked for 1.45s. Otherwise, it will spawn randomly between 1.5m and 9.5m from the Q center.

burst.notes: Attack buff detection area has the same hitbox.

Every Stormcluster has its own direction (0/90/180/270 degrees at base, 0/60/120/180/240/300 degrees at C4+), starts at Q-Titanbreaker position + 1.35m in that direction and moves at 1.35m per attack. Attack buff detection area has the same hitbox.

skill.notes: At every tick: Look for the closest enemy within 10m radius of Player. If no enemy was found, then check again in 0.1s. Otherwise, spawn the attack in 0.5s.

burst.notes: At every tick: Look for the closest enemy within 12m radius of Player with offsetY: 1. If an enemy was found, spawn the attack at their position.

skill.notes: Spawns on all enemies within 10m radius of Player.

burst.notes: At every tick: Below C4: spawn 1 attack at a random enemy in the burst area (7m radius around Player). At C4+: Select up to 3 entities (enemy > gadget). 1 entity: spawn 1 attack at that entity. 2 entities: 16% / 60% (first tick only) chance to spawn 2 attacks, 1 attack otherwise. 3 entities: 50% chance to spawn 2 attacks, 1 otherwise if first tick or 3 attacks were spawned in the previous tick. Otherwise 25%/50%/25% split between 1/2/3 attacks.
